videos.headline: St. Brown breaks tackles for 37-yard TD
videos.description: Amon-Ra St. Brown shakes a Colorado tackler and gets loose for a 37-yard USC touchdown run.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (St. Brown breaks tackles for 37-yard TD) 2019/10/25

videos.headline: Slovis connects with Pittman for 2 TDs in USC's comeback win
videos.description: Kedon Slovis throws a pair of touchdowns to Michael Pittman Jr. as USC comes from behind to beat Colorado.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NCF Highlight (Slovis connects with Pittman for 2 TDs in USC's comeback win) 2019/10/25 ESHEET
